sen.j: 文室 浄三（ふんや の きよみ、持統天皇7年（693年）- 宝亀元年10月9日 (旧暦)（770年10月31日））は、奈良時代の皇親（後に臣籍降下）。
sen.e: FUNYA no Kiyomi (693 - October 31, 770) was a member of the Emperor's family in the Nara period (later demoted from nobility to subject).
FUNYA no Kiyomi (693 - October 31, 770) was a member of the Imperial Family in the Nara period (Later demoted from nobility to subject.)
sen.cmt: Emperor's family→Imperial Family と修正しました。カッコ内、ピリオドの位置を修正しました。
sen.e: FUNYA no Kiyomi (693 - October 31, 770) was a member of the Imperial Family in the Nara period (Later demoted from nobility to subject.)

sen.j: 父は天武天皇の皇子長皇子。
sen.e: His father was Naga no miko who was Prince of Emperor Tenmu.
His father was Naga no miko who was the prince of the Emperor Tenmu.
sen.cmt: the を補いました。Prince→prince と修正しました。
sen.e: His father was Naga no miko who was the prince of the Emperor Tenmu.

sen.j: 初名は智努王（ちぬおう）。
sen.e: His original name was King Chinu.
His original name was Chinuo.
sen.cmt: 「ちぬおう」Chinuo としました。（King とあるとタイトルとして理解されてしまうため）
sen.e: His original name was Chinuo.

sen.j: 兄弟に文室大市等がいる。
sen.e: He has brothers including FUNYA no Ochi.
He has brothers including FUNYA no Ochi.

sen.j: 717年（養老元年）従四位下に叙され、造宮省などを歴任。
sen.e: In 717, he was granted jushiinoge (Junior Fourth Rank, Lower Grade) and held various posts like Ministry of Making and Mending Palaces.
In 717, he was granted jushiinoge (Junior Fourth Rank, Lower Grade) and served at various posts including the Ministry of Making and Mending Palaces.
sen.cmt: held→served at,like→including と修正しました。the を補いました。
sen.e: In 717, he was granted jushiinoge (Junior Fourth Rank, Lower Grade) and served at various posts including the Ministry of Making and Mending Palaces.

sen.j: 752年（天平勝宝4年）文室氏の姓を賜って臣籍に下り、761年（天平宝字5年）頃浄三と名を改めた。
sen.e: In 752, he was granted the Funya clan and demoted to subject, and changed his name to Kiyomi around 761.
In 752, he was granted the Funya clan and demoted to subject, and changed his name to Kiyomi around 761.
In 752, he was granted the Funya clan and demoted to subject, and changed his name to Kiyomi around 761.

sen.j: 757年（天平宝字元年）参議となり、中納言を経て762年（天平宝字6年）御史大夫（＝大納言）に昇任した。
sen.e: He became a councilor in 757, and promoted to a chief of controlling the officials (a chief councilor of state) in 762 after he experienced vice-councilor of state.
He became a councilor in 757, and promoted to become the chief of controlling the officials (a chief councilor of state) in 762, after serving as a vice-councilor of state.
sen.cmt: スペースを修正しました。カンマ、a, become を補いました。a→the,he experienced→serving as と修正しました。
sen.e: He became a councilor in 757, and promoted to become the chief of controlling the officials (a chief councilor of state) in 762, after serving as a vice-councilor of state.

sen.j: 764年（天平宝字8年）には職を辞している。
sen.e: He resigned the post in 764.
He resigned the post in 764.
He resigned the post in 764.

sen.j: 770年（宝亀元年）の称徳天皇の崩御後、吉備真備に次期天皇に推されたが、浄三はこれを辞退したという。
sen.e: After emperor Shotoku died in 770, he was recommended as the next Emperor by KIBI no Makibi, but he declined.
After the Emperor Shotoku died in 770, he was recommended as the next emperor by KIBI no Makibi, but he refused it.
sen.cmt: the, it を補いました。 emperor, Emperor をそれぞれ修正しました。declined→refused と修正しました。
sen.e: After the Emperor Shotoku died in 770, he was recommended as the next emperor by KIBI no Makibi, but he refused it.

sen.j: その約2ヵ月後に当人も薨去。
sen.e: Two months later, he died.
Two months later, he also died.
Two months later, he also died.
He was 78 years old at that time.
He died at the age of 78.
sen.cmt: 文脈に応じて修正しました。
sen.e: He died at the age of 78.
